description: The all-around hard shell. A minimalist design reduces the weight of the Kento Light HS Hooded Jacket Men. Extremely light. Extremely compressible. A universal companion on climbing, mountaineering or ski tours, for hiking, cycling or the office commute. Its waterproof and breathable properties make the Kento an all-around weather protection jacket.
name: Mammut Kento Light HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
